pkgmetadata.longdescription: Reliability Growth Analysis // Modeling and plotting functions for Reliability Growth Analysis (RGA). Models include the Duane (1962) doi:10.1109/TA.1964.4319640, Non-Homogeneous Poisson Process (NHPP) by Crow (1975) https://apps.dtic.mil/sti/citations/ADA020296, Piecewise Weibull NHPP by Guo et al. (2010) doi:10.1109/RAMS.2010.5448029, and Piecewise Weibull NHPP with Change Point Detection based on the 'segmented' package by Muggeo (2024) https://cran.r-project.org/package=segmented.
